item.title: 风险偏好增加，中国股市杠杆押注激增
item.description: 中国的杠杆股票仓位以十多年来最快的速度飙升，因为交易员们在黄金周假期归来后加大了风险押注。【原文：Leveraged equity positions in China surged at the fastest pace in more than a decade as traders boosted risky wagers upon their return from the Golden Week holiday.】

item.title: 中国紫金以 10 亿美元从纽蒙特手中收购加纳金矿
item.description: 紫金矿业集团股份有限公司以高达 10 亿美元的现金收购了加纳的 Akyem 黄金项目，这家国有企业希望增加资源，以实现其积极的产量目标。【原文：Zijin Mining Group Co. has bought the Akyem gold project in Ghana for as much as $1 billion in cash as the state-owned firm looks to add resources to meet its aggressive output targets.】

item.title: 亚洲私人银行发现从英国流向新加坡的非家庭资金不断增加
item.description: 据一位高级管理人员透露，由于英国政府考虑提高对富人的部分税收，中国华侨银行（Oversea-China Banking Corp.【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.’s private bank plans to grow its business in Europe to capture more asset flows from wealthy people in the UK as the British government mulls raising some taxes on them, according to a senior executive.】

item.title: 印度加入富时罗素新兴市场债券指数提振市场情绪
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 美国称正考虑将谷歌解体作为垄断案补救措施
item.description: 美国司法部向联邦法官表示，正在考虑建议强制谷歌出售部分业务，以减轻其垄断在线搜索市场所造成的损害，这将是一次历史性的反垄断解体。【原文：The US Justice Department told a federal judge it is considering recommending that Google be forced to sell off parts of its operations to alleviate the harm caused by its monopolization of the online search market, in what would be a historic antitrust breakup.】

item.title: Point72 将迁移东京办事处，扩大在日本的业务范围
item.description: 亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）迁入东京中央金融区一幢较新的摩天大楼后，其在东京的办公面积几乎翻了一番。【原文：Billionaire Steve Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management is almost doubling its office space in Tokyo as it moves to a newer skyscraper in the capital’s central financial district.】

item.title: 中国股市在经济刺激疑虑和假日数据疲软中下跌
item.description: 由于对中国政府的刺激计划持怀疑态度，以及假日消费数据出现疲软迹象，中国在岸上市股票开盘下跌，抹去了周二的部分涨幅。【原文：Chinese stocks listed onshore fell at the open, erasing some of Tuesday’s gains, amid skepticism about Beijing’s stimulus plans and signs of weakness in holiday-spending data.】

item.title: OpenAI 开始在新加坡招聘亚洲第二办公室人员
item.description: OpenAI 正在新加坡建立一个团队，以支持亚太地区对人工智能工具日益增长的需求。【原文：OpenAI is building a team in Singapore to support growing demand for artificial intelligence tools in the Asia-Pacific region.】

item.title: 印度人将家庭储蓄投入首次公开募股，引发对泡沫的担忧
item.description:
监管机构试图抑制市场狂热，但收效甚微。【原文：

Regulators try to tamp down the market frenzy, to little effect. 

】

item.title: HBO 纪录片认为比特币创造者中本聪就是开发者彼得-托德
item.description: HBO 一部关于比特币起源的新纪录片显示，原始加密货币的假名创造者中本聪很可能就是加拿大软件开发商彼得-托德。【原文：A new HBO documentary about the origins of Bitcoin suggests that Satoshi Nakamoto, the pseudonymous creator of the original cryptocurrency, is likely Canadian software developer Peter Todd.】

item.title: 合作伙伴集团支持的幼儿园首次公开募股融资 5.76 亿美元
item.description: KinderCare Learning Cos. 在首次公开募股中筹集了 5.76 亿美元，其定价接近市场定价范围的底线。【原文：KinderCare Learning Cos. raised $576 million in an initial public offering, priced toward the bottom of a marketed range.】

item.title: 初创企业 ID.me 以 18 亿美元估值让股东出售股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在线验证公司ID.me Inc.正在让员工和早期投资者出售股票，这笔交易对这家初创公司的估值为18亿美元。【原文：Online verification company ID.me Inc. is letting employees and early investors sell shares in a deal that values the startup at $1.8 billion, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 交易商关注中东局势，石油维持受中国影响的跌势
item.description: 市场还在关注以色列对上周伊朗导弹袭击的反应。【原文：Oil steadied after tumbling the most in almost a year in the previous session on concerns around China’s economic outlook, with the market also watching for Israel’s response to Iran’s missile barrage last week.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国科技股正在反弹。韩国将加入富时罗素的基准债券指数。交易员们正在为新西兰和印度的央行决议做准备。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US tech stocks are rallying. South Korea is set to join FTSE Russell’s benchmark bond index. And traders are priming for central bank decisions in New Zealand and India. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 华尔街竞相推出最新一批加密货币现货 ETF
item.description: 推出追踪第七大数字代币 XRP 的交易所交易基金的竞赛已经开始。【原文：The race to launch an exchange-traded fund tracking XRP, the seventh-largest digital token, has begun.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济部长表示墨西哥需要私人能源投资
item.description: 墨西哥一位内阁高官表示，墨西哥新总统计划为电力行业的私人投资制定明确的规则，他承认墨西哥没有足够的资源来扩大可再生能源的使用并解决电力供应和分配问题。【原文：Mexico’s new president plans to lay out clear rules for private investment in the power sector, a top cabinet official said, acknowledging that the state has insufficient resources to expand renewable energy use and address electricity supply and distribution problems.】

item.title: 科技股提振华尔街后亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 周三，在科技股反弹提振华尔街、对美联储降息的押注趋于稳定之后，亚洲股市早盘开始上涨。【原文：Equities in Asia were primed for early gains Wednesday after a tech rally lifted Wall Street and bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts stabilized.】

item.title: 瑞穗购买 "安全 "资产以减少美国软着陆失败带来的损失
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团公司（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. is preparing for short-term market disruptions if investors’ predictions of a soft landing in the US prove wrong, by stocking up on easy-to-sell assets such as Treasuries.】

item.title: 米尔顿市即将来临，Generac 备用发电机不足
item.description: 在飓风海伦（Helene）和近期其他风暴导致数百万美国人停电后，Generac Holdings Inc.【原文：Generac Holdings Inc. is running low on backup generators after Hurricane Helene and other recent storms knocked out power for millions of Americans.】

item.title: 美国风险投资为中国生物技术企业开辟融资之路
item.description: 面对奄奄一息的股票销售前景，以及在全球舞台上日益提高的知名度，一些中国生物技术公司已经找到了一种新的方法来利用其创新疗法套现。【原文：Faced with a moribund share sale outlook and emboldened by their growing recognition on the global stage, some Chinese biotechnology companies have found a new way to cash in on their innovative therapies.】

item.title: 诉讼称，Byju 的印度子公司从美国分公司抽走现金
item.description: 据周二向特拉华州联邦法院提起的诉讼称，印度企业家 Byju Raveendran 控制的一家软件公司违反美国破产规则，从美国子公司抽走现金。【原文：A software company controlled by Indian entrepreneur Byju Raveendran drained cash from US affiliates in violation of US bankruptcy rules, according to a lawsuit filed Tuesday in federal court in Delaware.】

item.title: 马斯克屈服于法官要求后，X获准重返巴西市场
item.description: 在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）满足了巴西最高法院的要求（包括删除部分用户账户和为该平台在巴西指定一名法律代表）后，巴西最高法院授权归还 X。【原文：Brazil’s Supreme Court authorized the return of X after Elon Musk complied with its demands, including taking down some user accounts and appointing a legal representative for the platform in the country.】

item.title: 大幅降息预期消失，空头国债押注涌现
item.description: 交易员们开始押注美国国债市场将出现亏损，因为他们认为美联储未来的降息步伐将更加渐进。【原文：Traders are beginning to bet on losses in the US Treasury market as they price in a more gradual pace of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts ahead.】

item.title: 韩国在债券市场改革后加入主要富时罗素指数
item.description: 韩国将加入富时罗素指数（FTSE Russell）的基准债券指数，这标志着数月来的官方宣传活动和金融市场基础设施的全面改革达到了高潮，希望借此吸引数百亿美元的资金流入。【原文：South Korea will join FTSE Russell’s benchmark bond index, capping months of official campaigning and a overhaul of financial market infrastructure in the hopes of attracting tens of billions of dollars of inflows.】

item.title: 埃尔德里奇旗下投资公司 Panagram 首席执行官辞职
item.description: 周二上午提交的一份文件显示，Panagram Structured Asset Management 首席执行官 John E. Kim 已从公司辞职，立即生效。【原文：John E. Kim, the chief executive officer of Panagram Structured Asset Management, has resigned from the firm effective immediately, according to a filing Tuesday morning.】

item.title: 津巴布韦向从土地掠夺中获益的农民提供土地保有权
item.description: 一位内阁部长表示，二十多年前从土地没收中获益的津巴布韦黑人农民将把他们的 99 年租约转为使用权，允许他们出售财产。【原文：Zimbabwean black farmers who benefitted from land seizures more than two decades ago will have their 99-year leases converted to tenure, allowing them to sell the property, a cabinet minister said.】

item.title: 花旗回击纽约州网上欺诈诉讼：我们不是'坏人
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. said US banks will be forced into a “dramatic shift” in how electronic payments are processed if New York state wins a lawsuit claiming the company doesn’t do enough to prevent online fraud.】

item.title: 习近平现在不能对经济刺激政策 "手软"— 为时已晚
item.description:
中国投资者知道这可能是入场的关键政策时刻，但除非具体细节开始成形，否则他们将失去信心。【原文：

China investors know this could be the key policy moment to get in, but they’ll lose confidence unless concrete details start taking shape.

】

item.title: 西班牙面包师 Europastry 今年第二次推迟 IPO
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙面包公司 Europastry SA 今年第二次推迟了首次公开募股。【原文：Spanish bakery firm Europastry SA has postponed its initial public offering for a second time this year, according to a person familiar with the matter, who asked not to be identified as the information isn’t public.】

item.title: Avante Health 申请破产，将业务出售给 Staple Street
item.description: 医疗设备供应商 Avante Health Solutions 申请破产，以便将其业务出售给私募股权公司 Staple Street Capital 的关联公司。【原文：Medical-equipment provider Avante Health Solutions filed for bankruptcy in order to sell its business to an affiliate of private equity firm Staple Street Capital.】
